name: AMERICAN VICTIMS OF TERRORISM C/O HEIDEMAN NUDELMAN & KALIK, P.C.
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying for Congressional support to urge state sponsors of terrorism to resolve the claims of the United States victims who were injured and/or killed as a result of terrorism.
